trans-unit.source: Reserves or commits a region of pages in the virtual address space of the calling process

seg-source.mrk: Reserves or commits a region of pages in the virtual address space of the calling process

target.mrk: Reserves or commits a region of pages in the virtual address space of the calling process

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Specifies the desired starting address of the region to allocate

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the desired starting address of the region to allocate

target.mrk: Specifies the desired starting address of the region to allocate

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size, in bytes, of th region

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of th region

target.mrk: Specifies the size, in bytes, of th region

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of allocation:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the type of allocation:

target.mrk: Specifies the type of allocation:

trans-unit.source: $MEM_COMMIT - Allocates physical storage in memory or in the paging file on disk for the specified region of pages.

seg-source.mrk: $MEM_COMMIT - Allocates physical storage in memory or in the paging file on disk for the specified region of pages.

target.mrk: $MEM_COMMIT - Allocates physical storage in memory or in the paging file on disk for the specified region of pages.

trans-unit.source: $MEM_RESERVE - Reserves a range of the process's virtual address space without allocating any physical storage.

seg-source.mrk: $MEM_RESERVE - Reserves a range of the process's virtual address space without allocating any physical storage.

target.mrk: $MEM_RESERVE - Reserves a range of the process's virtual address space without allocating any physical storage.

trans-unit.source: $MEM_TOP_DOWN - Allocates memory at the highest possible address

seg-source.mrk: $MEM_TOP_DOWN - Allocates memory at the highest possible address

target.mrk: $MEM_TOP_DOWN - Allocates memory at the highest possible address

trans-unit.source: Type of access protection:

seg-source.mrk: Type of access protection:

target.mrk: Type of access protection:

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_READONLY - Enables read access to the committed region of pages

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_READONLY - Enables read access to the committed region of pages

target.mrk: $PAGE_READONLY - Enables read access to the committed region of pages

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_READWRITE - Enables read and write access to the committed region

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_READWRITE - Enables read and write access to the committed region

target.mrk: $PAGE_READWRITE - Enables read and write access to the committed region

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_EXECUTE - Enables execute access to the committed region

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_EXECUTE - Enables execute access to the committed region

target.mrk: $PAGE_EXECUTE - Enables execute access to the committed region

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_EXECUTE_READ - Enables execute and read access to the committed region

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_EXECUTE_READ - Enables execute and read access to the committed region

target.mrk: $PAGE_EXECUTE_READ - Enables execute and read access to the committed region

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE - Enables execute, read, and write access to the committed region of pages

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE - Enables execute, read, and write access to the committed region of pages

target.mrk: $PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE - Enables execute, read, and write access to the committed region of pages

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_GUARD - Pages in the region become guard pages

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_GUARD - Pages in the region become guard pages

target.mrk: $PAGE_GUARD - Pages in the region become guard pages

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_NOACCESS - Disables all access to the committed region of pages

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_NOACCESS - Disables all access to the committed region of pages

target.mrk: $PAGE_NOACCESS - Disables all access to the committed region of pages

trans-unit.source: $PAGE_NOCACHE - Allows no caching of the committed regions of pages

seg-source.mrk: $PAGE_NOCACHE - Allows no caching of the committed regions of pages

target.mrk: $PAGE_NOCACHE - Allows no caching of the committed regions of pages

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: a memory address pointer.
